1.12.2.0.9: This update is brought to you by TorayLife. It features some scripting improvements, fixes and breaking API changes.
1.12.2.0.8: This update is brought to you by TorayLife and OtakuGamer. This update fixes a lot of bugs, improve scripting documentation and provides new scripting features!
1.12.2.0.7: This update is brought to you by TorayLife and OtakuGamer. This update features lots of new scripting API methods, QoL features, and brand new Scripted Items feature!
1.12.2.0.6: This update is brought to you by TorayLife. It features a lot of scripting related features like listening to Forge events, inline scripts, documentation improvements, and more!
1.12.2.0.5.1: This patch update features Entity attacked trigger by TorayLife.
1.12.2.0.5: This is another HUGE update developed by OtakuGamer and TorayLife! This update features lots of new scripting API methods, global triggers, scripting logs panel and a conditional model block!
1.12.2.0.4: This is a HUGE scripting API update by OtakuGamer with some minor contributions by TorayLife.
1.12.2.0.3.1: This patch hot fix fixes global triggers and scripts (TorayLife).
1.12.2.0.3: This update features rewrite of scripting system to support multiple scripting engines (like Kotlin scripts) and folder support in Mappet panels.
1.12.2.0.2.3: This quick update is compatible with McLib 2.4.1 changes.
1.12.2.0.2.2: This quick patch update patches and updates.
1.12.2.0.2.1: This quick patch update adds `IScriptEntity.getMorph()` and fixes a couple of documenation errors.
1.12.2.0.2: This update is brought to you by TorayLife (again), featuring NPC respawning mechanic, patrol points triggers, QoL tweaks and bug fixes! Thanks to Falkiner, ORION, OtakuGamer, Hrymka, and dyamo for ideas and suggestions!
1.12.2.0.1.5: This update is brought to you by TorayLife, with some neat QoL features, triggers and bug fixes!
1.12.2.0.1.4: More bug fixes and tiny tweaks.
1.12.2.0.1.3: This is a small patch update which fixes a couple of other things.
1.12.2.0.1.2: This is a small patch update which fixes a couple of things.
1.12.2.0.1.1: This is a small patch which also features new expression condition block.
1.12.2.0.1-alpha: This first release provides tons of features: states, conditions, expressions, emitter block, trigger block, region block, crafting tables, quests, NPCs, factions, events, scripts, dialogues, quest chains, many commands, custom sound events, target selectors, global triggers, and much more.
